name: Defense of the Mechs
description:
Defense of the Mechs is a science fiction tower defense game set in a dystopian future world. Place Battlemechs, upgrade them, and watch out for the evil robots. The longer you survive, the stronger the invading evil bots become.  Survive 21 rounds to basque in victory, if you're able.

Designed, developed and delivered by Joshua Flash

Mech art derived from Tatermand on OpenGameArt.org  - https://opengameart.org/users/...

Menu background courtesy of Max Pixel  - http://maxpixel.freegreatpictu...

Level thumbs from Richard Dorran on Deviant Art - http://richarddorran.deviantar...

'Game over' bot from kevatron400 on Deviant Art - http://kevatron400.deviantart....
